: : Kup : : 
Kup's head lowers, thinking over all of this. He then remembers the Rust plague that the Autobots had once come into contact with. 
Kup: Yes, we have seen this before. This is not good. We need to locate the pod, or what's left of it. 
 Rudra656@... wrote: ::Aerotaur:: 
      He gulps at Windlord's message.  "Sir, in short, the Plague will cause minor inconveniences at first, leading to hallucinations, then finally to rust.  I understand it to be very painful.  The victim's body just wastes away.  It is not unlike the Bubonic Plague of Earth history.  It killed nearly a third of the population of Cybertron.  I was vaccinated when I was still young but it was still untested when I left home... I don't even know if it's still in my system."  He shudders involuntarily.  "If that pod was rusting as the little one said it was ... the Plague is here.  It is only a matter of time."
